item.description:
The restaurant we will be going to is Christopher's. 1920 Mass Ave.
http://www.christophe...)
Please let me know what time you'll be arriving, so I can see if we should wait for you or start eating and eat at staggered times. I'll arrive around 5:30 or 5:45.


Does anyone want to join me for contra dancing in Cambridge this Friday night (7/31)?

I know it's last minute, but I was thinking of getting dinner in Porter Square (at a vegetarian-friendly restaurant) and then going to the dance, which starts at 7:30.

You don't need any experience in contra dancing (or any dancing skill) -- it's very easy, beginners can learn, and regulars are very friendly to newcomers. You get a partner, line up, and do a routine (different routine each time, that the caller walks you through at the beginning); then you move up the line repeating the routine, so you finally know it by the end of the dance!

More info at:
http://www.bidadance.....

Cost: $5-$10 + dinner
Bring: dessert to share during break + water bottle + soft-soled dance shoes (see website)



You can just come to the dance if you don't want dinner, or vice-versa.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a meetup sign at the restaurant and before the dance; at the dance, I'll try to tape sign up on wall
item.name: Contra dancing--Friday night
